original_title: 23 people arrested over forcibly entering building in Nawam Mawatha
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); 23 people have been arrested for allegedly forcibly entering a building and damaging property in Nawam Mawatha, Colombo.
Police Spokesman Attorney SSP Nihal Thalduwa said they had arrived from outstation.
Police said the suspects will be produced before the Colombo Fort Magistrate on Sunday (04).
